testsuite.name: streaming_ingest.Streaming ingestion for large binary items

testcase.classname: streaming_ingest.Streaming ingestion for large binary items
testcase.name: Ingest a large binary file and verify checksum
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Ingest a large binary file and verify checksum Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.003s And a binary file "large.bin" exists with size 1048576 bytes ... passed in 0.000s When I ingest the file "large.bin" into corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.005s Then the last ingest succeeds ... passed in 0.000s And the last ingest sha256 matches the file "large.bin" ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
